name: quasar-contact-app
description: Combined landing page, Angular chat frontend, and Node.js backend

scripts.dev: npm run copy:landing && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:landing && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && set -a && source .env && set +a && echo 'DEBUG: NG_APP_API_URL=' $NG_APP_API_URL && echo 'DEBUG: NG_APP_WS_URL=' $NG_APP_WS_URL && echo 'DEBUG: NG_APP_RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY=' $NG_APP_RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY && echo 'DEBUG: NODE_ENV=' $NODE_ENV && npx ng build --configuration production
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && if [ -d 'frontend/dist/browser' ]; then cp -r frontend/dist/browser/* dist/; elif [ -d 'frontend/dist' ]; then cp -r frontend/dist/* dist/; else echo 'No frontend dist found'; fi
scripts.copy:landing: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && if [ -d 'landing/dist' ]; then cp -r landing/dist/* dist/; else echo 'No landing dist found - building...'; cd landing && npm run build && cd .. && cp -r landing/dist/* dist/; fi
scripts.full: npm run clean && npm run build:landing && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy && npm run build:backend && npm start
scripts.build:landing: cd landing && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir -p public && cp -r landing/dist/* public/
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../landing && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/ && rm -rf public/ && rm -rf frontend/dist/ && rm -rf backend/dist/ && rm -rf landing/dist/
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:landing
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:landing
scripts.style: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.style:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format

author: art2url
